review1.name: Julie Victor
review1.content: Manoj and his group created wonderful stress-free experiences for us while traveling in India. He was responsive kind and helpful throughout. I recommend Eaze Tours highly. Julie V traveling with my family from Chicago.

review2.name: Manish
review2.content: We would like to thank you for arranging the Trip so nicely. It was really a good experience. We would specially like to appreciate Manoj for his management throughout the trip.

review3.name: Bernadette Cognac
review3.content: I cannot say enough good things about Eaze Tours. Wonderful, knowledgeable guides, and reliable drivers. Plus they know all the best spots for shopping and lunch!

review4.name: Liz and Jill Dean
review4.content: Hello, this is Liz and Jill from Anchorage, Alaska. Honestly, neither of us could think of anything that had to do with the tour management that could be improved. It all seemed seamless and smooth. The hotels, transportation, and food were all perfect. Thank you for everything, Liz and Jill Dean

review5.name: Laura Nitsos
review5.content: Hi Manoj, It's taken me a few days to get an email to you, but I wanted to let you know Tracy and I made it home (along with the rest of the group) Monday night. We were tired, but so happy to have had the opportunity to visit northern India.

review6.name: Fran A'Hern Smith
review6.content: I am home and yawning. I want to thank you again for your excellent ability to plan and coordinate the superb agenda. And, for your listening and leadership skills. You are one amazing person. I hope we meet again in person but I will always have a spirit connection.

team.title: About Our Team
description: Established in 2015, Eaze Tours is driven by three travel professionals, with decades of combined varied experience in Tour industry.

Our tours are built on extensive knowledge of our destinations, an outstanding team of professionals, and personalized top-notch service. Our experts completely customize your private tour to match your interests and preferences through their comprehensive knowledge of each destination.
Our head office is in Delhi, but we have a wide network of associate offices throughout the country manned by professionals.
We have young Team and Tourism professionals who knows values of customers and always gives 100% to satisfy customer needs.

manoj.name: Manoj Singh Rana
manoj.description: With over 28 years of industry experience, never missing an opportunity to amaze the traveller. His suggestions are backed by extensive research. Truthfulness and simplicity are two main points of his success.

harshit.name: Harshit Nagar
harshit.description: Harshit has done Masters in Tourism Management and have experience of over 18 years. Travelled and escorted with groups and FIT's as per requirement.
